org.springframework.data.rest.core.event

类 ValidatingRepositoryEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.rest.core.event.AbstractRepositoryEventListener<Object>
      • org.springframework.data.rest.core.event.ValidatingRepositoryEventListener

  • public class ValidatingRepositoryEventListener
extends AbstractRepositoryEventListener<Object>
    ApplicationListener implementation that dispatches RepositoryEvents to a specific Validator.
    作者:
    Jon Brisbin

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.springframework.data.rest.core.event.AbstractRepositoryEventListener

      • addValidator

        public ValidatingRepositoryEventListener addValidator(String event,
                                                      Validator validator)
        Add a Validator that will be triggered on the given event.
        参数:
        event - The event to listen for.
        validator - The Validator to execute when that event fires.
        返回:
        @this
